item.title: Related Resources
item.description: Useful Links GitHub Repository for OSCAL NIST Computer Security Resource Center: OSCAL Tools OSCALkit - Converts XML -> JSON (and vice versa) Videos and Presentations Security Automation Simplified via NIST OSCAL: We’re Not in Kansas Anymore Docker Government Summit 2018: Automating Security and Compliance via a New Standard of Standards News FedRAMP Looks to NIST for Security Control Refinements Automating Compliance for Highly Regulated Industries with Docker Enterprise Edition and OSCAL Federal Business Council Presentation What’s Next for FedRAMP?
